ActiveTcl User Guide

TclX

TclX Library

Writing C language extensions to Tcl.
Writing C language extensions to Tcl (Tcl_Obj-based commands).

Handles

Tcl_HandleAlloc, Tcl_HandleFree, Tcl_HandleTblInit, Tcl_HandleTblRelease, Tcl_HandleTblUseCount , Tcl_HandleWalk, Tcl_HandleXlate

Keyed Lists

TclX_NewKeyedListObj, TclX_KeyedListGet, TclX_KeyedListSet, TclX_KeyedListDelete, TclX_KeyedListGetKeys

Initialization

Tclx_Init, Tclxcmd_Init, TclX_Main, Tkx_Init, TkX_Main Extended

TclX commands

TclX commands
